main.name: Abdul Ahmad
main.description: Software Engineer(JavaScript | React.js | Node.js | Express.js | MongoDB | GraphQL)
main.bio: I develop accessible, optimized and user-accommodating web applications. Breaking complexities into solvable problems is my thing! I value problem solving, communication and collaboration as integral part of the creative process of software engineering.
